Posts.Content: Can anyone confirm any or all of the following claims made for the therapies provided by Dr. T. R. Shantha at Integrated Medical Specialist in Georgia? "...one doctor has risen to the top as the most qualified and the best able to help (cancer patients). His name is Dr. T.R. Shantha and his clinic is in Stockbridge. He was trained at Emory University and worked at Emory Hospital for many years. He has some of the best credentials in alternative medicine and he specializes in breast cancer...Dr. Shantha comes recommended as 'the best in the business.' The treatments Dr. Shantha uses are by name alternative, but most are approved by the FDA in some way. So we're looking at very legitimate treatments that have helped many people...In fact, his program is covered by Blue Cross, Blue Shield PPO...The cost of Dr. Shantha's program is $25,000..."
Posts.Title: Claims For Dr. Shantha's Therapies
